nodes.text: GAD-3 was a labor droid that worked on the Odionite space station The Spike during the time of the second Charge Matrica.

In 1032 BBY, GAD-3 was reprogrammated by the Jedi Knight Kerra Holt during her mission to The Spike and he helped her to damage the station. After Kerra ordered him to open the containment fields, he along with several droids and at least one Verpine crew-member were subsequently sucked into zero gravity space and presumably decompressed.

GAD-3 appears solely as a minor supporting antagonist in Knight Errant: Aflame 3—part of the Star Wars: Knight Errant comic series— which was released on December 8, 2010. John Jackson Miller developed his story background while he was drawn by Ivan Rodriguez and colored by Michael Atiyeh.
